title: Message to the Police Commissioner of New York City.
text:
My dear Mr. Commissioner:

The admirable police arrangements during my recent visit to New York added greatly to my pleasure and comfort and I wish you to know how cordially I appreciate your efforts.

I will be obliged if you will also convey to the members of your Department my thanks for their part in this valued service. Yours faithfully,

HERBERT HOOVER
garbage_collected: [Commissioner Edward P. Mulrooney, Police Headquarters, Center Street, New York City]
